MID (FUN)
MID (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION MID : STRING(255)
Returns a specific number of characters of a string, starting from a specific position
MID
(STR,
LEN,
POS)
means: Retrieve
LEN
characters from the
STR
string beginning with the character at position
POS
.
(* Example declaration *)
VarSTRING1
:
STRING
;
(* Example in ST , result is 'US' *)
VarSTRING1
:=
MID
(
'SUSI'
,
2
,
2
);
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
MID
STRING(255)
Partial string of
STR
Input
STR
STRING(255)
String to be analyzed
LEN
INT
Number of characters, counted from the left
POS
INT
Start position for the partial string
